mapper.select:
select
from umc_alarm_config where enable=1 and del_flag!=1

select * from umc_alarm_config c left join umc_alarm_template t on t.id=c.template_id left join umc_alarm_config_collect cc on cc.config_id=c.id where c.template_id=#{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and cc.collect_id=#{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
